sentence.value: The Ecuadorian Civilian Space Agency (EXA; Spanish: Agencia Espacial Civil Ecuatoriana) is a private Ecuadorian organization founded in 2007 that conducts research on space and planetary sciences.

sentence.value: It is a non-profit non-governmental organization with civilian oversight.
sentence.annotated-sentence: It is a [[non-profit non-governmental|Non-governmental_organization]] [[organization|Nonprofit_organization]] with civilian oversight.
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: It is a non-profit non-governmental organization with civilian oversight.

sentence.value: EXA had tested microgravity via parabolic flight with the Ecuadorian Air Force and Space Adventures.
sentence.annotated-sentence: [[EXA|EXA]] had tested [[microgravity|Microgravity_(album)]] via [[parabolic flight|Weightlessness]] with [[the Ecuadorian Air Force|Ecuadorian_Air_Force]] and [[Space Adventures|Space_Adventures]].
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: EXA had tested microgravity via parabolic flight with the Ecuadorian Air Force and Space Adventures.

sentence.value: EXA launched Ecuador's first satellite, the CubeSat NEE-01 Pegaso, in April 2013 aboard a Chinese Long March 2D.

sentence.value: Its second satellite, the follow-on CubeSat NEE-02 Krysaor, is planned for launch from Russia in November 2013.
sentence.annotated-sentence: Its second [[satellite|Satellite]], the follow-on [[CubeSat|AAU_CubeSat]] NEE-02 Krysaor, is planned for launch from [[Russia|Russia]] in [[November 2013|2013]].
